entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
